short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Casper Signer is the official non-custodial wallet that allows you to manage private keys and sign transactions on Casper Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Casper Signer is the official non-custodial wallet for The Casper Network. It allows you to create and manage the private keys to your accounts on The Casper Network, and to sign transactions for transfers and dApps on Casper Network
